page.title: 14*** BUSINESS IS BOOMING **
page.content: Some of us talked to Mr Metherall who works at G. Murray Auctioneer's Office.Mr Murray told us that he values houses and farms for sale but that he likes auctioneering the best.When he was a boy he used to go to the mart.They sold cows, sheep, pigs and horses.He said that things have changed now.I think he likes the old times best.Animals used to come by train but there is no station now.It was closed in the 1950's. All Murray's business was centred around the mart.They charge money for everything they sell.It is called commission.They also charge commission for selling property.When people come to the mart they sometimes go to the shops so the shopkeepers are pleased. Murray's is one of the oldest businesses in Haswell.Mr.Metherall says they do quite well.
